General.Name: Qingdao Yunlu Advanced Materials Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Qingdao Yunlu Advanced Materials Technology Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, produces, and sells advanced magnetic metal materials in China and internationally. The company offers amorphous strips and cores, nanocrystalline alloys, and magnetic alloy powder. Its products are used in the power distribution, infrastructure, rail transit, consumer electronics, new energy vehicles, home appliances, and particle accelerators, as well as other downstream industries. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.
General.Address: No.7 Xinyuan East Road, Qingdao, China

1.Name: Ms. Yan  Shi
1.Title: CFO & Sec. to the Board of Directors
